alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Caldwell; Clinton; Daviess; DeKalb; Gentry; Harrison (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 9:00AM CDT until June 29 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM CDT FOR EASTERN BUCHANAN...DAVIESS...CLINTON...SOUTHERN GENTRY... SOUTHWESTERN HARRISON...CALDWELL...EASTERN ANDREW AND DEKALB COUNTIES... At 900 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from King City to near Osborn to Plattsburg, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Cameron, Plattsburg, Lathrop, Hamilton, Gallatin, Gower, Maysville, King City, Braymer, Stewartsville, Polo, Jamesport, Union Star, Osborn, Breckenridge, Gilman City, Kingston, Pattonsburg, Clarksdale and Cowgill. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 39 and 88. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Buchanan; Caldwell; Clinton; Daviess; DeKalb; Gentry; Harrison
